thread.title: Couple jailed for physical and sexual abuse against girls | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Couple jailed for physical and sexual abuse against girls | Daily Mail Online

author: Amie Gordon For Mailonline
title: Couple jailed for physical and sexual abuse against girls | Daily Mail Online
text: Judge fights back tears as he jails couple for 'wicked and utterly inhuman' physical and sexual abuse against vulnerable girls including making them eat each other's vomit Michael Miszczak and Sandra Jones raped and beat their vulnerable victims Pair forced children to fight, watch pornography and rubbed their faces in urine Miszczak, 54, jailed for 25 years and Jones, 52, was sentenced to 14 years in jail Prosecutor said 'It's difficult to imagine a worse example of the rape of a child' Judge said crimes were 'wickedly cruel, chillingly heartless and utterly inhuman'
